scripts.build-js: browserify -x lodash -x redux src/darko.coffee -o dist/darko.js -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee" -s module.exports
scripts.watch-js: watchify -x lodash -x redux src/darko.coffee -o dist/darko.js -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee" -dv
scripts.//: Using `globstar` here for recursive wildcard support. (Also, using `jasmine-node` pretty much exclusively for the CoffeeScript support...)
scripts.build-demo: browserify -x lodash -x redux demo/src/demo.coffee -o demo/dist/demo.js -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee"
scripts.watch-demo: watchify -x lodash -x redux demo/src/demo.coffee -o demo/dist/demo.js -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee" -dv
scripts.demo: npm run watch-demo && npm run livereload-demo
scripts.build: npm run build-js-vendor && npm run build-js
scripts.test: npm run build-js && npm run run-tests
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js && npm run watch-tests
scripts.dev: npm run watch && npm run livereload
